alert.note: Alert for West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued April 09 at 3:21PM EDT until April 10 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Up to 1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas along Bogue Banks beaches, Bogue Sound, the Newport and White Oak Rivers, and adjacent tidal creeks. * WHEN...Until 2 AM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Up to 1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level is possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways resulting in a low threat of property damage. Some roads and low lying property including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes adjacent to the waterfront will experience shallow flooding.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
